/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from a pedestrian's perspective on the sidewalk, providing a ground-level view of the surroundings. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. A small stream meanders through the center of the street, adding a touch of tranquility to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Above, the sky is a clear blue, with a smattering of clouds dotting the horizon. The image is bathed in natural daylight, casting soft shadows and highlighting the vibrant colors of the scene. Despite the bustling cityscape, there's a sense of calm that pervades the image, as if inviting the viewer to take a leisurely stroll down this peaceful street in Beijing.
